lead_paragraph: The cable company is planning to step back from the purchasing process of The Daily News, a New York tabloid, according to a person familiar with the matter.

headline.print_headline: Company Ending Bid for Daily News
headline.main: Cablevision Ending Bid for Daily News

snippet: The cable company is planning to step back from the purchasing process of The Daily News, a New York tabloid, according to a person familiar with the matter.
abstract: Cablevision plans to drop bid for New York Daily News, money-losing newspaper being sold by Mortimer B Zuckerman; remaining bidders include Gristedes owner John A Catsimatidis and Jimmy Finkelstein, owner of Washington newspaper The Hill.
